stanza.line: What potions have I drunk of Sirentears
Distilled from limbecks foul as hellwithin
Applying fears to hopes and hopes tofears
Still losing when I saw my self towin
What wretched errors hath my heartcommitted
Whilst it hath thought it self so blessed never
How have mine eyes out of their spheres beenfitted
In the distraction of this madding fever
O benefit of ill now I find true
That better is by evil still made better
And ruined love when it is built anew
Grows fairer than at first more strong far greater
So I return rebuked to my content
And gain by ills thrice more than I have spent
